txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Prismatic Scales from the worms and avanc in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the prismatic scales for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough prismatic scales to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Prismatic Scales
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect prismatic scales from worms and avanc. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the prismatic scales to any task-board in Great River
You have accepted a task to acquire prismatic scales.
Wanted: Prismatic Scales from the worms and avanc in the Great River region.
